hed: Toms Founder Blake Mycoskie Takes *AD* on a Tour of His Los Angeles House
dek: Toms founder/philanthropist Blake Mycoskie and his conservationist wife, Heather, kick back in a quirky Los Angeles–area residence that brims with heart and soul

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-01.jpg
items.caption: [Toms](http://www.toms.com) founder Blake Mycoskie and his wife, Heather, at home in Topanga, California, with their goldendoodles, Gypsy and Buddha. The residence was renovated and decorated by the design studio [Hammer and Spear](http://hammerandspear.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-02.jpg
items.caption: An [RH](https://www.restorationhardware.com/) sofa and oversize lounge chair join a vintage Philip and Kelvin LaVerne cocktail table in the living room; the fireplace-surround tiles are from [Country Floors](http://www.countryfloors.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-03.jpg
items.caption: [Campion Walker Landscapes](http://campionwalker.com/) created a terrace of wildflowers and ornamental grasses.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-04.jpg
items.caption: The entrance hall is illuminated by a [Jason Koharik](http://www.collectedby.com) pendant light; the stained-glass window is by [Colin Adrian Glass](http://colinadrianglass.com), the trunk is vintage Louis Vuitton, and the flooring is reclaimed wood from the Coney Island boardwalk.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-05.jpg
items.caption: The kitchen is equipped with a [Lacanche](http://www.lacanche.com/index_en.php) range, brass countertops by [Hammer and Spear](http://hammerandspear.com/), and drawer pulls by [Rocky Mountain Hardware](http://rockymountainhardware.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-06.jpg
items.caption: Blake’s office is furnished with an antique cot from [Rewire](http://www.rewirela.com), a desk purchased in Bali, and a vintage campaign chair from [JF Chen](http://www.jfchen.com).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-07.jpg
items.caption: In the den, a Nick Brandt photograph hangs above a custom-made [Stephen Kenn](http://www.stephenkenn.com) sectional sofa upholstered in a vintage military fabric; the cocktail table, inlaid with mother-of-pearl, is from [JF Chen](http://www.jfchen.com), and the 1930s kilim in the foreground is from [Woven Accents](http://www.wovenonline.com).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-08.jpg
items.caption: [Hammer and Spear](http://www.hammerandspear.com) collaborated with [PSS Design Cult](http://www.pssdc.com) to devise an arklike storage unit for the Mycoskies’ son, Summit; the crib is by [RH Baby & Child](http://www.rhbabyandchild.com).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-09.jpg
items.caption: Summit’s bath features [Urban Electric Co.](http://www.urbanelectricco.com) sconces, [Rohl](http://www.rohlhome.com) sink fittings, custom-made concrete basins by [Hammer and Spear](http://www.hammerandspear.com) and [PSS Design Cult](http://www.pssdc.com), and [Arteriors](http://www.arteriorshome.com) cabinets; the vases are by [Heath Ceramics](http://www.heathceramics.com).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-blake-mycoskie-toms-los-angeles-home-10.jpg
items.caption: The master bedroom’s [Tara Design](http://www.tara-design.com) four-poster is crowned by a panel of vintage Ndop cloth from Cameroon and curtained in a [Lee Jofa](http://www.leejofa.com) linen.
